title: CO2 emissions : Canada 1995 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Emissions in million metric tons, containing a total of 24 data points.
Overall Emissions in million metric tons has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Emissions in million metric tons, of value 594.73 was reached at Year 2007
The lowest Emissions in million metric tons, of value 494.24 was reported at Year 1995
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Emissions in million metric tons, containing a total of 24 data points.
